snippet.title: Polygod Trailer | Steam | Xbox | Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Polygod, by Krafted Games, is a minimalist rogue-like FPS that will be available in early 2018 for PC, Xbox and Nintendo Switch!

http://store.steampowered.com/app/531530/Polygod/
